summary: Manages a collection of map layers sourced from multiple Web Map Service (WMS) instances, providing a unified interface within a popup dialog to add, remove, filter, prioritize, and synchronize layers, as well as handle user interactions such as clicks and double‑clicks.
business_intent: Enable end‑users of a GIS application to efficiently control and organize numerous WMS layers, improving map visualization, analysis, and workflow by offering intuitive layer management and synchronization capabilities.
